meanings.definition: The date on which a person was born.
meanings.sent1: My birthdates are in July and August.
meanings.sent2: She keeps a list of everyone's birthdates in her calendar.
meanings.sent3: For his birthday, he celebrated with a cake for each of his birthdates.
meanings.sent4: The birthdates of the trees marked the passing of the seasons.
meanings.sent5: Remembering important birthdates is a sign of thoughtfulness.

meanings.definition: The dates on which people were born.
meanings.sent1: Family gatherings often involve sharing stories about birthdates.
meanings.sent2: The birthdates of the twins are just a day apart.
meanings.sent3: The birthdates on the class roster made the teacher realize she had many summer babies.
meanings.sent4: The birthdates on the tombstones reminded visitors of the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: Learning the birthdates of historical figures can be fascinating.
